Format.name: Format
Format.description: Returns a class formatted according to the instructions contained in the format expression.

params.name: format
params.description: A valid named or user-defined format expression.

AddSheet.name: AddSheet
AddSheet.description: Creates a new worksheet. The new worksheet becomes the active sheet.

GetSheets.name: GetSheets
GetSheets.description: Returns a sheet collection that represents all the sheets in the active workbook.

GetActiveSheet.name: GetActiveSheet
GetActiveSheet.description: Returns an object that represents the active sheet.

GetSheet.name: GetSheet
GetSheet.description: Returns an object that represents a sheet.

GetThemesColors.name: GetThemesColors
GetThemesColors.description: Returns a list of all the available theme colors for the spreadsheet.

SetThemeColors.name: SetThemeColors
SetThemeColors.description: Sets the theme colors to the current spreadsheet.

params.name: sTheme
params.description: The color scheme that will be set to the current spreadsheet.

CreateColorFromRGB.name: CreateColorFromRGB
CreateColorFromRGB.description: Creates an RGB color setting the appropriate values for the red, green and blue color components.

CreateColorByName.name: CreateColorByName
CreateColorByName.description: Creates a color selecting it from one of the available color presets.

params.name: sPresetColor
params.description: A preset selected from the list of the available color preset names.

Intersect.name: Intersect
Intersect.description: Returns the ApiRange object that represents the rectangular intersection of two or more ranges. If one or more ranges from a different worksheet are specified, an error will be returned.

params.name: Range1
params.description: One of the intersecting ranges. At least two Range objects must be specified.

params.name: Range2
params.description: One of the intersecting ranges. At least two Range objects must be specified.

GetSelection.name: GetSelection
GetSelection.description: Returns an object that represents the selected range.

AddDefName.name: AddDefName
AddDefName.description: Adds a new name to a range of cells.

params.name: sRef
params.description: The reference to the specified range. It must contain the sheet name, followed by sign ! and a range of cells. Example: "Sheet1!$A$1:$B$2".

params.name: isHidden
params.description: Defines if the range name is hidden or not.

GetDefName.name: GetDefName
GetDefName.description: Returns the ApiName object by the range name.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Returns the ApiRange object by the range reference.

params.name: sRange
params.description: The range of cells from the current sheet.

params.name: bWithFormat
params.description: Specifies that the data will be received with the format.

RecalculateAllFormulas.name: RecalculateAllFormulas
RecalculateAllFormulas.description: Recalculates all formulas in the active workbook.

params.name: fLogger
params.description: A function which specifies the logger object for checking recalculation of formulas.

attachEvent.name: attachEvent
attachEvent.description: Subscribes to the specified event and calls the callback function when the event fires.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to be called when the event fires.

GetCommentById.name: GetCommentById
GetCommentById.description: Returns a comment from the current document by its ID.

GetComments.name: GetComments
GetComments.description: Returns all comments related to the whole workbook.

GetAllComments.name: GetAllComments
GetAllComments.description: Returns all comments from the current workbook including comments from all worksheets.

SetFreezePanesType.name: SetFreezePanesType
SetFreezePanesType.description: Sets a type to the freeze panes.

onWorksheetChange.name: onWorksheetChange
onWorksheetChange.description: The callback function which is called when the specified range of the current sheet changes. Please note that the event is not called for the undo/redo operations.

params.name: range
params.description: The modified range represented as the ApiRange object.

comment:
/**
	 * Base class.
	 * @global
	 * @class
	 * @name Api
	 * @property {Array} Sheets - Returns the Sheets collection that represents all the sheets in the active workbook.
	 * @property {ApiWorksheet} ActiveSheet - Returns an object that represents the active sheet.
	 * @property {ApiRange} Selection - Returns an object that represents the selected range.
	 * @property {ApiComment[]} Comments - Returns all comments related to the whole workbook.
	 * @property {FreezePaneType} FreezePanes - Returns or sets the type of freeze panes.
	 * @property {ApiComment[]} AllComments - Returns all comments from the current workbook including comments from all worksheets.
	 */

properties.name: Sheets
properties.description: Returns the Sheets collection that represents all the sheets in the active workbook.

properties.name: ActiveSheet
properties.description: Returns an object that represents the active sheet.

properties.name: Selection
properties.description: Returns an object that represents the selected range.

properties.name: Comments
properties.description: Returns all comments related to the whole workbook.

properties.name: FreezePanes
properties.description: Returns or sets the type of freeze panes.

properties.name: AllComments
properties.description: Returns all comments from the current workbook including comments from all worksheets.
